attributes.action: fix the flaws in the Oyster card system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have to realise that the Oyster card system is majorly and disgustingly flawed.How many times have YOU been unfairly penalised and lost out on £££'s of your hard-earned cash each month in 'fines?' do you want Mr.Johnson to fix these irritating machines and end the charade?

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor of London.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
